title: Small Caps
content:
I just finished a project using Dolly small caps. I thought they worked really well and it made me wonder what other great small caps I might not know about. I like Feijoa’s small caps also.

So if you have some small caps you would recommend, I would appreciate it.

Sharon

 [‹ CMYK and PMS](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37056 "Go to previous forum topic") [Best Laser Printer for type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202194629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36700 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
[Iowan Old Style](http://web.archive.org/www.identifont.com/show?250), by John Downer. Iowan is old style Venetian finish and characteristics built on present-day proportions (metrics, extender lengths). It has a large useful family including an excellent set of smallcaps.

j a m e s
Ah, that is nice. I like the M.
